description.narrative: 'By 2020, capacity of Ethiopia's general education system enhanced in sector planning and policy implementation at national and sub-national levels, which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, equitable access created and quality education and training provided to all learners at pre-primary and primary level and girls' access to secondary education increased, with a focus on the most disadvantaged and vulnerable children, populations and localities

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 'By 2020, capacity of Ethiopia’s general education system enhanced in sector planning and policy implementation at national and sub-national levels

description.narrative: Development of ESDP V Results Framework (at national and regional level) and utilization of it as a tool for operational planning, monitoring and evaluation; strategic support for Mid-Term Evaluation of Education Sector Development Programme (ESDP V) which were used as an evidence bases for finalization of the new Education and Training Roadmap 2030 coupled with support for development of the Education Act as a legal framework for provision of quality education as well as integration of refugee EMIS into the national EMIS system were the most noticeable achievements under the sector planning and management result area. | Status:Partially Met | As-of Date:30/06/2020

title.narrative: Number of MoE and REB staff who receive certification from education sector planning and management course (provided by UNESCO IIEP)

target.value: 2020:65 (10 each from AAF, SO, BG, GM,TG and 15 from MoE)

actual.value: 2020:65 (10 each from Afar, Somali, BG, Gambella, Tigray and 15 from MoE)

title.narrative: Number of regions which develop and utilize crisis-sensitive ESDP V plans and associated Results Framework, for informing operational planning, monitoring and evaluation

actual.value: 2020:8 Benishangul Gumuz, SNNPR, Amhara, Oromia, Tigray, Afar, Somali and Gambella)

title.narrative: EMIS that transparently feeds findings back to communities or school management committees - score
